text:
Eight passengers were grievously injured in a collision between two State transport buses here near Jujuvaadi on Saturday.

An SETC bus from Chennai to Bengaluru collided with another SETC bus from Bengaluru to Hosur, in the early hours of Saturday. Both buses were carrying over 30 passengers each. Eight persons, including the drivers of the two buses, suffered grievous injuries and were rushed to Hosur Government hospital.
title: 8 hurt in accident
